name: Cloak of souls
data: It increases the users strength somewhat.
It increases the users dexterity somewhat.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users fire resistance superbly.
It increases the users magic resistance superbly.
It makes the user more resistant to magic damage.
It makes the user more resistant to fire damage.
